project_info.title: Freight Frenzy scoring app
project_info.desc: An Android app that helps calculating score for the FIRST Tech Challenge robotic competition. Students can also register team, or sharing score, etc.

project_info.title: Pathfinding algorithms visualiser
project_info.desc: A program that demonstrate several pathfinding algorithms (A*, BFS, DFS, etc.)

project_info.title: Nand2Tetris computer system
project_info.desc: A simple computer system with necessary hardware (developed in HDL) and software (developed in Python), built during the Nand2Tetris course

project_info.title: Medbuddy mobile app
project_info.desc: A software solution that was built during UniHack 2022 hackathon, as a companion to solve medical-related problems. I was responsible for the Android app
